page.title: 15 LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: There is one very large electronics firm where many people from Wokingham are employed.The firm is American based and has 30 factories throughout the world,employing 30,000 people making mainly computers and calculators.The Winnersh sales office was opened in 1975 and in the early 1980s the company opened new factories in the adjacent industrial area known as the Winnersh Triangle.Wokingham and its surrounds form part of what is becoming known as Britain's Silicon Valley.There are numerous computer based firms:thus the area is extremly prosperous.
